gen:link.msg:message: `EqualisationReserve` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E3_EqualisationReserve')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E3_EqualisationReserve return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E3_ChildrenOfEqualisationReserveCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E3_ChildrenOfEqualisationReserveCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E3_ChildrenOfEqualisationReserveDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E3_ChildrenOfEqualisationReserveDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
